00055   bool display_mutation_errors(int error, const char *what, TableMutator *mutator) {
00056     std::vector<std::pair<Cell, int> > failed_mutations;
00057 
00058     mutator->get_failed(failed_mutations);
00059 
00060     if (!failed_mutations.empty()) {
00061       for (size_t i=0; i<failed_mutations.size(); i++) {
00062         cout << "Failed: (" << failed_mutations[i].first.row_key << ","
00063              << failed_mutations[i].first.column_family;
00064 
00065         if (failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier &&
00066             *(failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier))
00067           cout << ":" << failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier;
00068 
00069         cout << "," << failed_mutations[i].first.timestamp << ") - "
00070              << Error::get_text(failed_mutations[i].second) << endl;
00071       }
00072     }
00073     else {
00074       cerr << "Error: " << Error::get_text(error) << " - " << what << endl;
00075       return false;
00076     }
00077     return true;
00078   }
00079 
00080 }

00094 void HqlCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00095   String schema_str;
00096   String out_str;
00097   hql_interpreter_state state;
00098   hql_interpreter interp(state);
00099   parse_info<> info;
00100   Schema *schema;
00101 
00102   info = parse(line.c_str(), interp, space_p);
00103 
00104   if (info.full) {
00105 
00106     if (state.command == COMMAND_SHOW_CREATE_TABLE) {
00107       schema_str = m_client->get_schema(state.table_name);
00108       schema = Schema::new_instance(schema_str.c_str(),
00109                                     schema_str.length(), true);
00110       if (!schema->is_valid())
00111         HT_THROW(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, schema->get_error_string());
00112 
00113       schema->render_hql_create_table(state.table_name, out_str);
00114       cout << out_str << flush;
00115     }
00116     else if (state.command == COMMAND_HELP) {
00117       const char **text = HqlHelpText::Get(state.str);
00118 
00119       if (text) {
00120         for (size_t i=0; text[i]; i++)
00121           cout << text[i] << endl;
00122       }
00123       else
00124         cout << endl << "no help for '" << state.str << "'" << endl << endl;
00125     }
00126     else if (state.command == COMMAND_CREATE_TABLE) {
00127       if (!state.clone_table_name.empty()) {
00128         schema_str = m_client->get_schema(state.clone_table_name);
00129         schema = Schema::new_instance(schema_str.c_str(), strlen(schema_str.c_str()), true);
00130         schema_str.clear();
00131         schema->render(schema_str);
00132         m_client->create_table(state.table_name, schema_str.c_str());
00133       } else {
00134         schema = new Schema();
00135         schema->set_compressor(state.table_compressor);
00136 
00137         foreach(const Schema::AccessGroupMap::value_type &v, state.ag_map)
00138           schema->add_access_group(v.second);
00139 
00140         if (state.ag_map.find("default") == state.ag_map.end()) {
00141           Schema::AccessGroup *ag = new Schema::AccessGroup();
00142           ag->name = "default";
00143           schema->add_access_group(ag);
00144         }
00145         foreach(const Schema::ColumnFamilyMap::value_type &v, state.cf_map) {
00146           if (v.second->ag == "")
00147             v.second->ag = "default";
00148           schema->add_column_family(v.second);
00149         }
00150         const char *error_str = schema->get_error_string();
00151 
00152         if (error_str)
00153           HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, error_str);
00154         schema->render(schema_str);
00155         m_client->create_table(state.table_name, schema_str.c_str());
00156       }
00157     }
00158     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DESCRIBE_TABLE) {
00159       schema_str = m_client->get_schema(state.table_name);
00160       cout << schema_str << endl;
00161     }
00162     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SELECT) {
00163       TablePtr table_ptr;
00164       TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00165       ScanSpec scan_spec;
00166       Cell cell;
00167       uint32_t nsec;
00168       time_t unix_time;
00169       struct tm tms;
00170       RowInterval  ri;
00171       CellInterval ci;
00172 
00173       scan_spec.row_limit = state.scan.limit;
00174       scan_spec.max_versions = state.scan.max_versions;
00175       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.columns.size(); i++)
00176         scan_spec.columns.push_back(state.scan.columns[i].c_str());
00177 
00178       if (state.scan.row_intervals.size() && state.scan.cell_intervals.size())
00179         HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, "ROW predicates and CELL predicates can't be combined");
00180 
00181       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.row_intervals.size(); i++) {
00182         ri.start = state.scan.row_intervals[i].start.c_str();
00183         ri.start_inclusive = state.scan.row_intervals[i].start_inclusive;
00184         ri.end = state.scan.row_intervals[i].end.c_str();
00185         ri.end_inclusive = state.scan.row_intervals[i].end_inclusive;
00186         scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00187       }
00188 
00189       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.cell_intervals.size(); i++) {
00190         ci.start_row = state.scan.cell_intervals[i].start_row.c_str();
00191         ci.start_column = state.scan.cell_intervals[i].start_column.c_str();
00192         ci.start_inclusive = state.scan.cell_intervals[i].start_inclusive;
00193         ci.end_row = state.scan.cell_intervals[i].end_row.c_str();
00194         ci.end_column = state.scan.cell_intervals[i].end_column.c_str();
00195         ci.end_inclusive = state.scan.cell_intervals[i].end_inclusive;
00196         scan_spec.cell_intervals.push_back(ci);
00197       }
00198 
00199       scan_spec.time_interval.first  = state.scan.start_time;
00200       scan_spec.time_interval.second = state.scan.end_time;
00201       scan_spec.return_deletes = state.scan.return_deletes;
00202 
00203       table_ptr = m_client->open_table(state.table_name);
00204 
00205       scanner_ptr = table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00206 
00207       while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00208         if (state.scan.display_timestamps) {
00209           if (m_timestamp_output_format == TIMESTAMP_FORMAT_USECS) {
00210             printf("%llu\t", (long long unsigned int)cell.timestamp);
00211           }
00212           else {
00213             nsec = cell.timestamp % 1000000000LL;
00214             unix_time = cell.timestamp / 1000000000LL;
00215             gmtime_r(&unix_time, &tms);
00216             printf("%d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d:%02d.%09d\t", tms.tm_year+1900,
00217                    tms.tm_mon+1, tms.tm_mday, tms.tm_hour, tms.tm_min,
00218                    tms.tm_sec, nsec);
00219           }
00220         }
00221         if (!state.scan.keys_only) {
00222           if (cell.column_family) {
00223             printf("%s\t%s", cell.row_key, cell.column_family);
00224             if (*cell.column_qualifier)
00225               printf(":%s", cell.column_qualifier);
00226           }
00227           else
00228             printf("%s", cell.row_key);
00229           if (cell.flag != FLAG_INSERT)
00230             printf("\t%s\tDELETE\n", String((const char *)cell.value,
00231                                             cell.value_len).c_str());
00232           else
00233             printf("\t%s\n", String((const char *)cell.value,
00234                                      cell.value_len).c_str());
00235         }
00236         else
00237           printf("%s\n", cell.row_key);
00238       }
00239     }
00240     else if (state.command == COMMAND_LOAD_DATA) {
00241       TablePtr table_ptr;
00242       TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00243       uint64_t timestamp;
00244       KeySpec key;
00245       uint8_t *value;
00246       uint32_t value_len;
00247       uint32_t consumed;
00248       uint64_t file_size;
00249       uint64_t total_values_size = 0;
00250       uint64_t total_rowkey_size = 0;
00251       string start_msg;
00252       uint64_t insert_count = 0;
00253       Stopwatch stopwatch;
00254       bool into_table = true;
00255       bool display_timestamps = false;
00256       FILE *outfp = 0;
00257 
00258       if (state.table_name == "") {
00259         if (state.output_file == "")
00260           HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR,
00261                    "LOAD DATA INFILE ... INTO FILE - bad filename");
00262         outfp = fopen(state.output_file.c_str(), "w");
00263         into_table = false;
00264       }
00265       else {
00266         table_ptr = m_client->open_table(state.table_name);
00267         mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00268       }
00269 
00270       if (!FileUtils::exists(state.input_file.c_str()))
00271         HT_THROW(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, state.input_file);
00272 
00273       file_size = FileUtils::size(state.input_file.c_str());
00274 
00275       if (!m_silent && !m_test_mode) {
00276         printf("\nLoading ");
00277         const char *format = "%3lld,";
00278         if (file_size > 1000000000000LL) {
00279           printf(format, file_size/1000000000000LL);
00280           format = "%03lld,";
00281         }
00282         if (file_size > 1000000000LL) {
00283           printf(format, (file_size%1000000000000LL) / 1000000000LL);
00284           format = "%03lld,";
00285         }
00286         if (file_size > 1000000LL) {
00287           printf(format, (file_size%1000000000LL) / 1000000LL);
00288           format = "%03lld,";
00289         }
00290         if (file_size > 1000LL) {
00291           printf(format, (file_size%1000000LL) / 1000LL);
00292           printf("%03lld", file_size % 1000LL);
00293         }
00294         else
00295           printf("%3lld", file_size % 1000LL);
00296         printf(" bytes of input data...\n");
00297         fflush(stdout);
00298       }
00299 
00300       boost::progress_display *show_progress = 0;
00301 
00302       if (!m_silent && !m_test_mode)
00303         show_progress = new boost::progress_display(file_size);
00304 
00305       auto_ptr<LoadDataSource> lds(new LoadDataSource(state.input_file,
00306           state.header_file, state.key_columns, state.timestamp_column,
00307           state.row_uniquify_chars, state.dupkeycols));
00308 
00309       if (!into_table) {
00310         display_timestamps = lds->has_timestamps();
00311         if (display_timestamps)
00312           fprintf(outfp, "timestamp\trowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n");
00313         else
00314           fprintf(outfp, "rowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n");
00315       }
00316 
00317       while (lds->next(0, &timestamp, &key, &value, &value_len, &consumed)) {
00318         if (value_len > 0) {
00319           insert_count++;
00320           total_values_size += value_len;
00321           total_rowkey_size += key.row_len;
00322           if (into_table) {
00323             try {
00324               mutator_ptr->set(timestamp, key, value, value_len);
00325             }
00326             catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00327               do {
00328                 if (!display_mutation_errors(e.code(), e.what(), mutator_ptr.get()))
00329                   return;
00330               } while (!mutator_ptr->retry(30));
00331             }
00332           }
00333           else {
00334             if (display_timestamps)
00335               fprintf(outfp, "%llu\t%s\t%s\t%s\n", (Llu)timestamp,
00336                       (const char *)key.row, key.column_family,
00337                       (const char *)value);
00338             else
00339               fprintf(outfp, "%s\t%s\t%s\n", (const char *)key.row,
00340                       key.column_family, (const char *)value);
00341           }
00342         }
00343         if (!m_silent && !m_test_mode)
00344           *show_progress += consumed;
00345       }
00346 
00347       if (into_table) {
00348         // Flush pending updates
00349         try {
00350           mutator_ptr->flush();
00351         }
00352         catch (Exception &e) {
00353           do {
00354             if (!display_mutation_errors(e.code(), e.what(), mutator_ptr.get()))
00355               return;
00356           } while (!mutator_ptr->retry(30));
00357         }
00358       }
00359       else
00360         fclose(outfp);
00361 
00362       if (!m_silent && !m_test_mode && show_progress->count() < file_size)
00363         *show_progress += file_size - show_progress->count();
00364 
00365       delete show_progress;
00366 
00367       stopwatch.stop();
00368 
00369       if (!m_silent && !m_test_mode) {
00370         printf("Load complete.\n");
00371         printf("\n");
00372         printf("  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00373         printf("Avg value size:  %.2f bytes\n",
00374                (double)total_values_size / insert_count);
00375         printf("  Avg key size:  %.2f bytes\n",
00376                (double)total_rowkey_size / insert_count);
00377         printf("    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s\n",
00378                (double)file_size / stopwatch.elapsed());
00379         printf(" Total inserts:  %llu\n", (Llu)insert_count);
00380         printf("    Throughput:  %.2f inserts/s\n",
00381                (double)insert_count / stopwatch.elapsed());
00382         if (mutator_ptr)
00383           printf("       Resends:  %llu\n",
00384                  (Llu)mutator_ptr->get_resend_count());
00385         printf("\n");
00386       }
00387     }
00388     else if (state.command == COMMAND_INSERT) {
00389       TablePtr table_ptr;
00390       TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00391       KeySpec key;
00392       char *column_qualifier;
00393       String tmp_str;
00394 
00395       table_ptr = m_client->open_table(state.table_name);
00396 
00397       mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00398 
00399       for (size_t i=0; i<state.inserts.size(); i++) {
00400         key.row = state.inserts[i].row_key.c_str();
00401         key.row_len = state.inserts[i].row_key.length();
00402         key.column_family = state.inserts[i].column_key.c_str();
00403         if ((column_qualifier = strchr(state.inserts[i].column_key.c_str(), ':')
00404             ) != 0) {
00405           *column_qualifier++ = 0;
00406           key.column_qualifier = column_qualifier;
00407           key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(column_qualifier);
00408         }
00409         else {
00410           key.column_qualifier = 0;
00411           key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00412         }
00413         try {
00414           mutator_ptr->set(state.inserts[i].timestamp, key,
00415                            (uint8_t *)state.inserts[i].value.c_str(),
00416                            (uint32_t)state.inserts[i].value.length());
00417         }
00418         catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00419           if (!display_mutation_errors(e.code(), e.what(), mutator_ptr.get()))
00420             return;
00421         }
00422       }
00423 
00424       try {
00425         mutator_ptr->flush();
00426       }
00427       catch (Exception &e) {
00428         if (!display_mutation_errors(e.code(), e.what(), mutator_ptr.get()))
00429           return;
00430       }
00431     }
00432     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DELETE) {
00433       TablePtr table_ptr;
00434       TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00435       KeySpec key;
00436       char *column_qualifier;
00437       String tmp_str;
00438 
00439       table_ptr = m_client->open_table(state.table_name);
00440 
00441       mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00442 
00443       memset(&key, 0, sizeof(key));
00444       key.row = state.delete_row.c_str();
00445       key.row_len = state.delete_row.length();
00446 
00447       if (state.delete_time != 0)
00448         state.delete_time++;
00449 
00450       if (state.delete_all_columns) {
00451         try {
00452           mutator_ptr->set_delete(state.delete_time, key);
00453         }
00454         catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00455           display_mutation_errors(e.code(), e.what(), mutator_ptr.get());
00456           return;
00457         }
00458       }
00459       else {
00460         for (size_t i=0; i<state.delete_columns.size(); i++) {
00461           key.column_family = state.delete_columns[i].c_str();
00462           if ((column_qualifier = strchr(state.delete_columns[i].c_str(), ':'))
00463               != 0) {
00464             *column_qualifier++ = 0;
00465             key.column_qualifier = column_qualifier;
00466             key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(column_qualifier);
00467           }
00468           else {
00469             key.column_qualifier = 0;
00470             key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00471           }
00472           try {
00473             mutator_ptr->set_delete(state.delete_time, key);
00474           }
00475           catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00476             if (!display_mutation_errors(e.code(), e.what(), mutator_ptr.get()))
00477               return;
00478           }
00479         }
00480       }
00481       try {
00482         mutator_ptr->flush();
00483       }
00484       catch (Exception &e) {
00485         if (!display_mutation_errors(e.code(), e.what(), mutator_ptr.get()))
00486           return;
00487       }
00488     }
00489     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SHOW_TABLES) {
00490       std::vector<String> tables;
00491       m_client->get_tables(tables);
00492       if (tables.empty())
00493         cout << "Empty set" << endl;
00494       else {
00495         for (size_t i=0; i<tables.size(); i++)
00496           cout << tables[i] << endl;
00497       }
00498     }
00499     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DROP_TABLE) {
00500       m_client->drop_table(state.table_name, state.if_exists);
00501     }
00502     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SHUTDOWN) {
00503       m_client->shutdown();
00504     }
00505     else
00506       HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, String("unsupported command: ") + line);
00507   }
00508   else
00509     HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, String("parse error at: ") + info.stop);
00510 
00511 }
